title: *Final Price Reduction 7/29* FS 26 T206s Just got back from SGC. Priced Individually
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: *Final Price Reduction 7/29* FS 26 T206s Just got back from SGC. Priced Individually
posts.post_content:
Hey Everyone,

I have decided to sell the following cards to make room for another purchase. Just got them back this week from SGC... some cards have the new half grade.  I have taken 3 pictures of each card. A close up of the front, a close up of the back, and a full view of the front so you can see the SGC label... The full view pics are at the bottom of the album.
Best way to reach me is by email:   [url]Blunder19@aol.com[/url]


Here are the pictures: [url]http://s251.photobucket.com/albums/gg309/blunder19/T206s%20for%20Sale%207-28/?start=all[/url]

Here are the cards and their prices: (All prices include shipping)
T206 Cobb SGC 30... $650
T206 Chase (Dark Cap) SGC 55... SOLD
T206 Mathewson (Dark Cap) SGC 50... $SOLD
T206 Bliss SGC 50 (American Beauty Back)... $300
T206 Geyer SGC 35... SOLD

T206 Bradley SGC 40...  SOLD

T206 Schulte (back) SGC 55... SOLD
T206 Snoodgrass (catching) SGC 40... SOLD

Thanks everyone for all your emails.. Just reduced some of the prices... please email me if interested in any

Jamie
I'll take the Bridwell. Email sent

Jamie, 

I received the Chase today (Monday).  Top notch.  I paid for this card and it was in my mailbox roughly 18 seconds later.  Also, e-mail sent.

Thanks Bob,

always happy to help a fellow collector get their cards as fast as possible....as others have done for me in the past.

Its a great hobby.
